title: Doppelgänger
description: Intelligent, human-sized shape-shifters of wicked character and highly magical nature.
extras: Shape stealing: Can adopt the form of any human-like creature (7’ tall or less) observed. Then proceed to attack the person mimicked.	Trickery: Will attempt to kill a PC, take on their role, then attack the party by surprise (e.g. during a battle).	Reversion: If killed, reverts to its original form.	Spell immunity: Unaffected by sleep and charm spells.
